Articles.Content: How about adding some space-instrumental classics to KSP's space soundtrack? Blue Danube for instance?

Obligatory plug for UpsilonAerospace's music

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/88869-KSP-Plugin-Songs!-%28Current-Song-SUN%29](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/88869-KSP-Plugin-Songs!-%28Current-Song-SUN%29)

The OP in that thread can only hold 5 linked videos, his latest track, "Sun", is on page 10

I think these tracks should be in the game, once Upsilon finishes all of them.
Also Sprach Zarathustra as well. Gustav Holst's The Planets could be used.
